From: Pierre Dorlian <Pierre.Dorlian@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Thursday, November 28, 2024 12:27 PM
To: Lina El Moabbi <Lina.Elmoabbi@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: QLC CR & Insurance Renewals

 

Hi Lina,

In reviewing the insurance agreement attached, please we would need to put the following in the loss payee section as a replacement to what is there already.

The bank to whom we currently have a liability with is HSBC with an amount of QAR1,444,771.18 payable on January 20th, 2025 broken down as QAR1,428,933.83 as repayment of principle and QAR15,837.35 as interest payment.
Upon the automatic bank settlement of this due to HSBC on January 20th, 2025, HSBC will no longer be the party to receive any money from QLC under this policy that expires on September 30th, 2025.

The bank to whom we currently have a liability with is HSBC with an amount of QAR1,444,771.18 payable on January 20th, 2025 broken down as QAR1,428,933.83 as repayment of principle and QAR15,837.35 as interest payment.
Upon the automatic bank settlement of this due to HSBC on January 20th, 2025, HSBC will no longer be the party to receive any money from QLC under this policy that expires on September 30th, 2025.

 

Reference the below screenshot dealing in the case of a loss payment, the money should be transferred to QLC designated bank account at time of transfer to WLC. Kindly let us rephrase the below to give the aforementioned meaning.
I leave it to the insurance company to share the updated text in the above context for our confirmation.



 

Many Thanks and Kind Regards,

 

PIERRE DORLIAN​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ FINANCE

QATAR LUXURY CO. WLL

DOHA

‑

QATAR

Hi Lina,

In reviewing the insurance agreement attached, please we would need to put the following in the loss payee section as a replacement to what is there already.

The bank to whom we currently have a liability with is HSBC with an amount of QAR1,444,771.18 payable on January 20th, 2025 broken down as QAR1,428,933.83 as repayment of principle and QAR15,837.35 as interest payment.
Upon the automatic bank settlement of this due to HSBC on January 20th, 2025, HSBC will no longer be the party to receive any money from QLC under this policy that expires on September 30th, 2025.
